name: The Rasputin Directive
description:
Comply.

Subvert.

----

You've awoken in a strange place. Where are you? Who are you?

----

If you need help, check the in game journal for hints.

Note: Unfortunately we started late and did not get our ambitious version done in time but we want to continue to work on this and make the real version too. :)

FOLLOW FOR EPISODE 2!
